00336 class db_dump {
00337 private:
00338    static uint32 getLen( const SharedBuffer* buf, int len ) {
00339       if ( len != -1 ) {
00340          return len;
00341       }                          
00342       if ( buf == NULL ) {
00343          return 0;
00344       }      
00345       return buf->getCurrentOffset();
00346    }
00347 public:
00348    db_dump( const SharedBuffer& buf, int len = -1 )
00349          : m_buf( buf ),
00350            m_len( getLen(&buf, len) ) {
00351    }
00352  
00353    friend ostream& operator<< (ostream& outStream, const db_dump& dumper);
00354 private:
00355    const SharedBuffer& m_buf;
00356    uint32 m_len;
00357 };

00360 inline void
00361 SharedBuffer::assertByteAligned() const
00362 {
00363    DEBUG1( MC2_ASSERT( m_bytesOK ) );
00364 }
00365 
00366 inline void
00367 SharedBuffer::assertPositionAfter() const
00368 {
00369    MC2_ASSERT( m_pos <= (m_buf + m_bufSize ) );
00370 }
00371 
00372 inline byte*
00373 SharedBuffer::getBufferAddress() const 
00374 {
00375    return m_buf;
00376 }
00377 
00378 inline uint32 
00379 SharedBuffer::getCurrentOffset() const
00380 {
00381    assertByteAligned();
00382    return m_pos - m_buf;
00383 }
00384 
00385 inline uint8*
00386 SharedBuffer::getCurrentOffsetAddress() const
00387 {
00388    assertByteAligned();
00389    return m_pos;
00390 }
00391 
00392 inline uint32 
00393 SharedBuffer::getBufferSize() const
00394 {
00395    return m_bufSize;
00396 }
00397 
00398 inline uint32
00399 SharedBuffer::getNbrBytesLeft() const
00400 {
00401    return getBufferSize() - getCurrentOffset();
00402 }
00403 
00404 inline bool
00405 SharedBuffer::bufferFilled() const
00406 {
00407    return getCurrentOffset() == getBufferSize();
00408 }
00409 
00410 inline void
00411 SharedBuffer::readPastBytes(int nbrBytes)
00412 {
00413    assertByteAligned();
00414    m_pos += nbrBytes;
00415    assertPositionAfter();
00416 }
00417 
00418 inline void
00419 SharedBuffer::reset()
00420 {
00421    m_pos = m_buf;
00422 }
00423 
00424 inline void
00425 SharedBuffer::setOffsetToSize()
00426 {
00427    reset();
00428    readPastBytes( getBufferSize() );
00429 }
00430 
00431 inline void 
00432 SharedBuffer::setSelfAlloc(bool newVal) 
00433 {
00434    m_selfAlloc = newVal;
00435 }
00436 
00437 inline void
00438 SharedBuffer::writeNextByte( uint8 value)
00439 {
00440    assertByteAligned();
00441    *m_pos++ = value;
00442    assertPositionAfter();
00443 }
00444 
00445 inline void
00446 SharedBuffer::writeNextBAByte( uint8 value)
00447 {
00448    writeNextByte(value);
00449 }
00450 
00451 inline uint8
00452 SharedBuffer::readNextByte( )
00453 {
00454    assertByteAligned();
00455    return *m_pos++;
00456    assertPositionAfter();
00457 }
00458 
00459 inline uint8
00460 SharedBuffer::readNextBAByte( )
00461 {   
00462    return readNextByte();
00463 }
